text: Ni We wamenesheje abahakanye bo mu bahawe igitabo, abakura mu ngo zabo ku ikoraniro rya mbere. Ntimwakekaga ko bagenda kandi na bo bakekaga ko inyubako zabo z’imitamenwa zabarinda (ibihano bya) Allah! Nyamara ibihano bya Allah byabagezeho biturutse aho batakekaga, nuko abateza ubwoba mu mitima kugeza ubwo bisenyeye amazu bakoresheje amaboko yabo ndetse n’amaboko y’abemeramana. Ngaho nimubikuremo isomo yemwe abashishoza
